title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB:
1. Open a new basic project
2. Create a new file test.xml
3. The XML file is opened with the scripted resource editor example
4. In the Navigator, select test.xml
5. Right-click and choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor'
6. Nothing happens; the scripted resource editor example remains active

Reproducing the steps above should consider the editor types. When a file is already open and a different editor type is selected, a new editor should open on the file.
